languages.text: {n}Техножрец, трижды повторив процедуру ввода команды и сопроводив их надлежащими молитвами, сумрачно хрипит:{/n} "Дух машины, управляющий данным шлюзом, слишком прост и бесхитростен, чтобы его можно было обмануть. Этот шлюз проще деконструировать, чем заставить открыться".

{n}After repeating the command entry protocol three times, with all the appropriate prayers, the Tech-Priest says in a gloomy, raspy voice,{/n} "The machine spirit controlling this airlock is too simple and guileless to be tricked. It would be easier to deconstruct this airlock than to compel it to open."
languages.original_text: {n}Техножрец, трижды повторив процедуру ввода команды и сопроводив их надлежащими молитвами, сумрачно хрипит:{/n} "Дух машины, управляющий данным шлюзом, слишком прост и бесхитростен, чтобы его можно было обмануть. Этот шлюз проще деконструировать, чем заставить открыться".

traits.locale_text: {n}After repeating the command entry protocol thrice, with all the appropriate prayers, the Tech-Priest says in a gloomy, raspy voice,{/n} "The machine spirit controlling this airlock is too simple and guileless to be tricked. It would be easier to deconstruct this airlock than to get it to open."

It would be easier to deconstruct this airlock than to compel it to open."

{n}After repeating the command entry protocol three times, with all the appropriate prayers, the Tech-Priest says in a gloomy, raspy voice,{/n} "The machine spirit controlling this airlock is too simple and guileless to be tricked. It would be easier to deconstruct this airlock than to compel it to open."

{n}After repeating the command entry protocol three times, with all the appropriate prayers, the Tech-Priest says in a gloomy, raspy voice,{/n} "The machine spirit controlling this airlock is too simple and guileless to be tricked. It would be easier to deconstruct this airlock than to compel it to open."

languages.text: {n}Tras repetir el protocolo de orden de entrada tres veces, acompañándolo de las plegarias adecuadas, el tecnosacerdote proclama con voz lúgubre y jadeante:{/n} «El espíritu máquina que controla la esclusa es demasiado simple y carente de astucia como para engañarlo. Sería más fácil desmantelar la esclusa que obligarlo a abrirla».
languages.original_text: {n}After repeating the command entry protocol three times, with all the appropriate prayers, the Tech-Priest says in a gloomy, raspy voice,{/n} "The machine spirit controlling this airlock is too simple and guileless to be tricked. It would be easier to deconstruct this airlock than to compel it to open."

traits.locale_text: {n}Tras repetir el protocolo de orden de entrada tres veces, acompañándolo de las plegarias adecuadas, el tecnosacerdote proclama con voz lúgubre y jadeante:{/n} «El espíritu máquina que controla la esclusa es demasiado simple y carente de astucia como para engañarlo. Sería más fácil desmantelar la esclusa que obligarlo a abrirla».

languages.text: {n}技术神甫重复了三遍命令输入协议，进行了合适的祈祷之后，以阴沉、沙哑的声音开了口。{/n}“控制这个气闸的机魂功能过于简单，性格也过于诚实，无法诱骗它打开气闸。比起强迫它打开气闸，直接把气闸拆掉反而会更容易些。”
languages.original_text: {n}After repeating the command entry protocol three times, with all the appropriate prayers, the Tech-Priest says in a gloomy, raspy voice,{/n} "The machine spirit controlling this airlock is too simple and guileless to be tricked. It would be easier to deconstruct this airlock than to compel it to open."

traits.locale_text: {n}技术祭司重复了三遍命令输入协议，进行了合适的祈祷之后，以阴沉、沙哑的声音开了口。{/n}“控制这个气闸的机魂功能过于简单，性格也过于诚实，无法诱骗它打开气闸。比起强迫它打开气闸，直接把气闸拆掉反而会更容易些。”

languages.text: {n}コマンド入力プロトコルを3回繰り返し、必要な祈りもすべて捧げた後、技術司祭は暗い掠れた声で言った。{/n}「このエアロックを制御する機械精霊は、極めて単純かつ幼稚であるため、騙すことはできない。エアロックを開かせるより、解体して開ける方が容易いであろう」
languages.original_text: {n}After repeating the command entry protocol three times, with all the appropriate prayers, the Tech-Priest says in a gloomy, raspy voice,{/n} "The machine spirit controlling this airlock is too simple and guileless to be tricked. It would be easier to deconstruct this airlock than to compel it to open."

traits.locale_text: {n}コマンド入力プロトコルを3回繰り返し、必要な祈りもすべて捧げた後、技術司祭は暗い掠れた声で言った。{/n}「このエアロックを制御する機械精霊は、極めて単純かつ幼稚であるため、騙すことはできない。エアロックを開かせるより、解体して開ける方が容易いであろう」

languages.text: {n}Nachdem du das Protokoll zur Befehlseingabe samt aller anwendbarer Gebete dreimal wiederholt hast, meint der Techpriester mit unheilvoller, rauer Stimme:{/n} "Der Maschinengeist, der diese Luftschleuse kontrolliert, ist zu simpel und arglos, um ihn zu überlisten. Es wäre einfacher, die Luftschleuse zu demontieren, als ihn zum Öffnen zu bewegen."
languages.original_text: {n}After repeating the command entry protocol three times, with all the appropriate prayers, the Tech-Priest says in a gloomy, raspy voice,{/n} "The machine spirit controlling this airlock is too simple and guileless to be tricked. It would be easier to deconstruct this airlock than to compel it to open."

traits.locale_text: {n}Nachdem du das Protokoll zur Befehlseingabe samt aller anwendbarer Gebete dreimal wiederholt hast, meint der Techpriester mit unheilvoller, rauer Stimme:{/n} "Der Maschinengeist, der diese Luftschleuse kontrolliert, ist zu simpel und arglos, um ihn zu überlisten. Es wäre einfacher, die Luftschleuse zu demontieren, als ihn zum Öffnen zu bewegen."

languages.text: {n}Après avoir répété trois fois le protocole de saisie des commandes, accompagné des prières appropriées, le technoprêtre déclare d'une voix sombre et rauque :{/n} « L'esprit de la machine qui contrôle ce sas est trop simple et candide pour être dupé. Il serait plus facile de démanteler le sas que de le forcer à s'ouvrir. »
languages.original_text: {n}After repeating the command entry protocol three times, with all the appropriate prayers, the Tech-Priest says in a gloomy, raspy voice,{/n} "The machine spirit controlling this airlock is too simple and guileless to be tricked. It would be easier to deconstruct this airlock than to compel it to open."

traits.locale_text: {n}Après avoir répété trois fois le protocole de saisie des commandes, accompagné des prières appropriées, le technoprêtre déclare d'une voix sombre et rauque :{/n} « L'esprit de la machine qui contrôle ce sas est trop simple et candide pour être dupé. Il serait plus facile de démanteler le sas que de le forcer à s'ouvrir. »

languages.text: {n}Komut giriş protokolünü ilgili dualar eşliğinde üç kez tekrar ettikten sonra Tekno Rahip; mahzun, gıcırtılı bir sesle konuşmaya başlıyor.{/n} "Bu hava kilidini kontrol eden makine ruhu, fazlasıyla basit ve kandırılamayacak kadar naif. Hava kilidini açılmaya ikna etmektense yeniden yapılandırmak daha kolay olacaktır."
languages.original_text: {n}After repeating the command entry protocol three times, with all the appropriate prayers, the Tech-Priest says in a gloomy, raspy voice,{/n} "The machine spirit controlling this airlock is too simple and guileless to be tricked. It would be easier to deconstruct this airlock than to compel it to open."

Hava kilidini açılmaya ikna etmektense yeniden yapılandırmak daha kolay olacaktır."
